languages.text: "Помимо этого губернатор Драйвстем передал Вашей милости личное сообщение. Смиренно прошу Вольного Торговца об аудиенции, дабы передать его".

traits.locale_text: Мастер Вокса докладывает о важном сообщении и просит удостоить ее личной аудиенции в покоях Вольного Торговца.
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "In addition, Governor Drivestem has sent a private message to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I humbly ask the Rogue Trader for an audience so I may deliver it."
languages.original_text: "Помимо этого губернатор Драйвстем передал Вашей милости личное сообщение. Смиренно прошу Вольного Торговца об аудиенции, дабы передать его".

traits.locale_text: "Additionally, Governor Drivestem sent a private message to Your Grace. I humbly ask the Rogue Trader for an audience so I can deliver it."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "Additionally, Governor Drivestem sent a private message to Your Grace. I humbly ask the Rogue Trader for an audience so I can deliver it."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "In addition, Governor Drivestem has sent a private message to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I humbly ask the Rogue Trader for an audience so I may deliver it."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "In addition, Governor Drivestem has sent a private message to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I humbly ask the Rogue Trader for an audience so I may deliver it."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "In addition, Governor Drivestem has sent a private message to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I humbly ask the Rogue Trader for an audience so I may deliver it."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “此外，德莱夫斯塔总督还向您发了一条私人信息，大人。我谦卑地请求您的接见，这样我才可以传达这条信息。”
languages.original_text: "In addition, Governor Drivestem has sent a private message to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I humbly ask the Rogue Trader for an audience so I may deliver it."

traits.locale_text: “此外，德莱夫斯塔总督还向您发了一条私人信息，大人。我谦卑地请求您的接见，这样我才可以传达这条信息。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «Además, el gobernador Drivestem le ha enviado un mensaje privado, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Comerciante Independiente, le ruego humildemente una audiencia para poder entregárselo».
languages.original_text: "In addition, Governor Drivestem has sent a private message to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I humbly ask the Rogue Trader for an audience so I may deliver it."

traits.locale_text: «Además, el gobernador Drivestem le ha enviado un mensaje privado, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Comerciante Independiente, le ruego humildemente una audiencia para poder entregárselo».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Überdies hat Gouverneur Drivestem eine private Nachricht an Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} geschickt. Ich bitte {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} demütig um eine Audienz, damit ich sie überbringen kann."
languages.original_text: "In addition, Governor Drivestem has sent a private message to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I humbly ask the Rogue Trader for an audience so I may deliver it."

traits.locale_text: "In addition, Governor Drivestem has sent a private message to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I humbly ask the Rogue Trader for an audience so I may deliver it."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « En outre, le gouverneur Drivestem a fait parvenir un message privé à Votre Seigneurie. Je demande humblement audience {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} afin de pouvoir lui en communiquer la teneur. »
languages.original_text: "In addition, Governor Drivestem has sent a private message to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I humbly ask the Rogue Trader for an audience so I may deliver it."

traits.locale_text: « En outre, le gouverneur Drivestem a fait parvenir un message privé à Votre Seigneurie. Je demande humblement audience {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} afin de pouvoir lui en communiquer la teneur. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「加えて、ドライブステム総督から、陛下に個人的なメッセージが届きました。恐れながら、自由開拓者様に謁見してお渡ししたいです」
languages.original_text: "In addition, Governor Drivestem has sent a private message to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I humbly ask the Rogue Trader for an audience so I may deliver it."

traits.locale_text: 「加えて、ドライブステム総督から、陛下に個人的なメッセージが届きました。恐れながら、自由開拓者様に謁見してお渡ししたいです」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Ayrıca Vali Drivestem, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne özel bir mesaj gönderdi. Hür Tacir'le bir görüşme rica ediyorum ki bu mesajı iletebileyim."
languages.original_text: "In addition, Governor Drivestem has sent a private message to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I humbly ask the Rogue Trader for an audience so I may deliver it."
